When #China joined WTO it agreed to trade rules. But they violate these rules regularly especially by forcing U.S. com­pa­nies to trans­fer tech­nol­ogy to Chi­nese companies if they want to pro­duce or sell in China. What is point of rules if we aren’t going to enforce them?

Last year, I wrote to Ginnie Mae – a federal agency – & asked it to go after mortgage lenders who exploit veterans with shady mortgage refinances. Ginnie Mae just said it will crack down on 2 of the worst offenders. This is good news for vets & taxpayers. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2018-04-04/u-s-is-said-to-restrict-lenders-in-veterans-mortgage-crackdown
